text: Attilio Viviani (born 18 October 1996 in Oppeano) is an Italian cyclist, who currently rides for UCI WorldTeam . He is the younger brother of professional cyclist Elia Viviani, who is also a member of the team. ==Major results== ;2013 : 6th GP Dell'Arno ;2019 : 1st Schaal Sels ;2020 : 1st Stage 1 La Tropicale Amissa Bongo == References == ==External links== * Category:Italian male cyclists Category:1996 births Category:Living people
title: Attilio Viviani
